${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

DESCRIPTIONS: When you lose HP, lose #b
more. Reduces by #b1 each turn.

DESCRIPTIONS: When #yMalleable is triggered, increase #yBlock gain by #b
next time #yMalleable is triggered in the same turn.

${modID}:SoulBond.NAME: Soul Bond
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, enemy loses equal HP.
Whenever you lose HP, enemy loses equal HP #b
times.

DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you heal HP, increase HP gain by #b

${modID}:Sadism.NAME: Sadism
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack this turn, heal #b

${modID}:ToxicRecoil.NAME: Toxic Recoil
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, apply #b

${modID}:EndlessHunger.NAME: Endless Hunger
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, lose #b
Max HP. Gain #b
Max HP when a non-Minion enemy dies.

${modID}:Laceration.NAME: Laceration
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply #b

${modID}:JokesOnYou.NAME: Joke's On You
